description:
http: make Transport warning about connections closing more accurate

It was fragile and non-portable, and then became spammy with
the os.EINVAL removal.  Now it just uses the length of the
Peek return value instead.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=5eb676b44184 ***

http: make Transport warning about connections closing more accurate

It was fragile and non-portable, and then became spammy with
the os.EINVAL removal.  Now it just uses the length of the
Peek return value instead.

R=golang-dev, alex.brainman
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5453065

subject: code review 5453065: http: make Transport warning about connections closing ...
